title: Game crashed as soon as i got finished installing everything and started a game

replies.body: Some of those files might be damaged or corrupted which is causing your game to crash. Check out this [**crash guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974#wq6) to run a repair, as well as some other steps which could help the game run a little smoother. Hit me back if your game keeps crashing though!
